page.title: 21Portobello: Ammendum
page.content:
Portobello housing was upgraded in 2007 by local area housing. The area is served by a bus service every half hour. Manygates School is now a Adult Education Centre for learning new skills. the public house was removed in 2004 and a block of flats was built. The four shops is now 2 others being a community point and a chip shop. Sandal Castle now has a visitors centre and access for disabled people.
Contribution by: Will
